name: Dragonfly (ing)
description:
Dragonfly (ing)

Dragonfly (ing) is a high-score game where you attempt to ward off beings called "sears" from the skies as a dragon. Complete with a high score system and over three different selections of skins, Dragonfly  (ing) is sure to immerse you as a dragon soaring amidst a skyborne universe.

Made for the scorespace jam #21.

Sprites from opengameart.org with the exception of the dragonfly from Elthen's Pixel Art Shop. Music from Free Music Archives.
